TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l ɪ z k ɔː s s t eɪ l ɐ æ s k h ɑːɹ t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð ɪ z θ ɪ ŋ z w ɪ θ ɜː f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t oʊ s ɪ k s p oʊ n s ʌ v f ɹ ɛ ʃ n oʊ p iː z f aɪ v θ ɪ k s l æ p s ʌ v b l uː tʃ iː z æ n d m eɪ b i ɪ s n æ k f h ɑːɹ b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b ɔ b w uː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔː l p l æ s t ɪ k s n ɪ k æ n d ɐ b ɪ ɡ tʃ aɪ f ɹ ɔ ɡ f ɔːɹ ð ə k ɪ d z ʃ iː k æ n s k uː p ð iː z θ ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t ʊ θ ɹ iː ɹ ɛ d b æ ɡ z æ n w uː w ɪ l ɡ oʊ ɡ ɛ æ n ŋ w uː w l ɡ oʊ m ɪ t ɑːɹ w ɛ n z d ɪ æ ð ə t ɹ æ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
